statements: SELECT * FROM social_connections ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, target_id FROM social_connections WHERE interaction_type = 'Like';
SELECT target_id, interaction_type FROM social_connections ORDER BY target_id ASC, interaction_type DESC;
SELECT id, interaction_date FROM social_connections WHERE id = '876c7607-3e2d-43a4-8431-3c3393aa0eff';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM social_connections WHERE interaction_type = 'Comment';
SELECT id, target_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM social_connections WHERE target_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, target_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM social_connections WHERE interaction_type LIKE 'friend%'
SELECT target_id, interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM social_connections GROUP BY target_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT * FROM social_connections WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date
SELECT id, target_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM social_connections WHERE target_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, social_score FROM targets WHERE social_score > 100;
SELECT name, interaction_type FROM targets JOIN interactions ON targets.id = interactions.target_id;
SELECT id, name FROM targets WHERE social_score IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, social_score FROM targets WHERE social_score > 100 ORDER BY social_score DESC
SELECT name, social_score FROM targets WHERE id = 5
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE social_score < 50 AND name LIKE '%example%'
SELECT id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Like' AND source_id = 3
SELECT id, target_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT id, name, age, profession FROM targets;
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE strength > 50 ORDER BY source_id DESC;
SELECT id, relationship FROM connections WHERE target_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM targets WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM targets INNER JOIN connections ON targets.id = connections.target_id
SELECT name, age FROM targets WHERE profession = 'Doctor' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT target_id, SUM(strength) AS total_strength FROM connections GROUP BY target_id HAVING total_strength > 100
SELECT t.name, c.relationship FROM targets t JOIN connections c ON t.id = c.target_id WHERE t.age > 30 AND c.strength >= 50 ORDER BY t.name
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM targets
SELECT * FROM social_targets;
SELECT id, name, location FROM social_targets ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT job_title, location FROM social_targets WHERE job_title IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'meeting' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT target_id, vulnerability, potential_exploit FROM weak_points WHERE vulnerability LIKE '%exploit%';
SELECT * FROM social_targets;
SELECT id, name, job_title FROM social_targets WHERE location='New York';
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, source_id ASC;
SELECT source_id, target_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='like' OR interaction_type='comment';

SELECT social_targets.name, social_links.link_strength FROM social_targets INNER JOIN social_links ON social_targets.id=social_links.target_id WHERE social_links.link_strength>5 ORDER BY social_targets.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM targets
SELECT id, name, age FROM targets WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT target_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'meeting'
SELECT target_id, connection_strength FROM connections WHERE connection_strength > 50
SELECT * FROM targets ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, location FROM targets WHERE occupation = 'Engineer' ORDER BY name;

SELECT t.name, i.timestamp, w.description FROM targets t JOIN interactions i ON t.id = i.target_id JOIN weaknesses w ON t.id = w.target_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'Meeting' ORDER BY i.timestamp DESC;

SELECT c.*, t.name AS target_name, c2.connection_strength FROM connections c JOIN targets t ON c.target_id = t.id JOIN connections c2 ON c.connected_target_id = t.id WHERE c.connection_type = 'Friend' ORDER BY c2.connection_strength DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT m.manipulation_id, m.manipulator_id, t.name AS target_name, m.manipulation_type, m.success FROM manipulation m JOIN targets t ON m.target_id = t.id WHERE m.success = TRUE LIMIT 5;
